comments.body:
Could you add a comment in the above line with the following link to a PR to resolve this issue?

https://github.com/fmoo/python-varint/pull/8

You could also add a link to your issue raising adding the license files (https://github.com/fmoo/python-varint/pull/7). Thanks for doing that.
